original_text: I realized that it is better to be wise than foolish. In the same way, the light is better than the dark. I realized that it is better to be wise than foolish.
korean_text: 내가 보니 지혜가 우매보다 뛰어남이 빛이 어둠보다 뛰어남 같도다

sentences.original_text: that it is better to be wise than foolish
sentences.korean_translation: 어리석은 것보다 지혜로운 것이 더 낫다는 것을

sentences.original_text: the light is better than the dark
that it is better to be wise than foolish
sentences.korean_translation: 어리석은 것보다 지혜로운 것이 더 낫다는 것을
